title: PM’s Tiger Force playing vital role against coronavirus: Usman dar
content:
SIALKOT, May 09 (APP)::Special Assistant to Prime Minister on Youth Affairs Usman Dar has said the Prime Minister’s Tiger Force is playing a pivotal role in serving the nation.
He said this while addressing a meeting of the Tiger Force held at Anwar Club Auditorium here on Saturday.
He said members of the Tiger Force were in the field to serve the nation in coronavirus pandemic as they had dedicated their capabilities and energies for prosperity and public welfare.
Usman Dar said the Tiger Relief Force was a non-political organization which was serving the nation, adding that it was working with full devotion, dedication and enthusiasm in the country.
Deputy Commissioner Dr Nasir Mehmood Bashir, DPO Capt (retd) Mustansar Feroz, Assistant Commissioner Javeria Maqbul and others also attended the meeting.
